# Horned King

Horned King may refer to
* Alexander the Great, compare Horns of Alexander
* Horned King (Chronicles of Prydain), a character in Lloyd Alexanderâ€™s Chronicles of Prydain
* Horned King, character in Disney's The Black Cauldron, based on the Chronicles of Prydain
* the Golden Horned King () and Silver Horned King (), characters from the Chinese novel Journey to the West
See also
* Horned deity
